shibboleth.model

Class GitGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • shibboleth.model.GitGraph

  • public class GitGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    A (bipartite) directed graph containing users and repos and their relationship. The edge direction is from repos to users.
    • The edge size depends on the percentage of contributions a user did to a repo. And ranges between EDGE_SIZE_MIN and EDGE_SIZE_MAX.
    • The node size depends on its out degree and ranges between NODE_SIZE_MIN and NODE_SIZE_MAX.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.String nodeName)
        Remove node with the given node name. Removes neighbors of the given node if their degree will become equal to 0; Generally speaking the node name is either a Github user name or a Github repo name.
        Parameters:
        nodeName -
        Returns:
        Whether a node was indeed removed from the graph.

      • removeAll

        Remove all nodes from the graph.
